snippet: The death, in Guangdong Province, was the first in 18 months attributed to the virus.
abstract: Man in China's Guangdong Province dies of bird flu, countries first reported human death attributed to the virus in 18 months.
lead_paragraph: The death, in Guangdong Province, was the first in 18 months attributed to the virus.

headline.seo: China Says Man Dies From Bird Flu
headline.main: China Says Man Dies From Bird Flu
headline.print_headline: Man Dies From Bird Flu in Southern China
